content: this is a summary of a legal case heard in the district court in ljubljana the case involved two parties one owning a vw polo car and the other owning a toyota avensis car the court decision was made on august 28 2013 after a procedure that lasted for 6 months and 9 days the resolution states that the plaintiff will give back the ownership rights of a real estate property to the defendant while the defendant will give back the ownership rights of the vw polo car to the plaintiff the court used specific laws to make this decision the details of the settlements reached in court are confidential and not available for translation

metadata.cost: Each party bears their own costs
